description: This source file implements command execution utilities for running shell commands and capturing their output, including functions for executing commands with formatted inputs and handling output buffers.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec_xv(char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,va_list args)
methods.description: Executes a command formatted with variadic arguments, capturing output, exit code, and optionally logging output lines.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec_x(char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,...)
methods.description: Wrapper around os_cmd_exec_xv that accepts variadic arguments instead of va_list.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec(char ** buffer,char * fmt,...)
methods.description: Simpler interface to execute a command with a format string, with output captured and returned.

ctags.name: os_cmd_exec_x
ctags.pattern: /^bool os_cmd_exec_x(char **buffer, int *len, int *exit_code, int flags, char *fmt, ...)$/

ctags.name: os_cmd_exec_xv
ctags.pattern: /^bool os_cmd_exec_xv(char **buffer, int *len, int *exit_code, int flags, char *fmt, va_list args)$/
ctags.signature: (char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,va_list args)
